tasks.label: build project
tasks.command: taskkill /F /IM main.exe >nul 2>&1 & del main.exe >nul 2>&1 & g++ -g src/main.cpp src/game.cpp -o main.exe -I D:/SFML-2.5.1/include -L D:/SFML-2.5.1/lib -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -lwinmm -lopengl32 -lgdi32 & xcopy /Y "D:\SFML-2.5.1\bin\*.dll" "." >nul
